text: Alʙatta, sumoro ʙa andake tars va gurusnagi va nuqsoni molho ki ʙa dusvori ʙa dast ovarda mesavad, jo az dast meravad va conho; ʙa faro rasidani marg, jo qatl va kam sudani mevaho meozmoem. Va, ej Pajomʙar, saʙrkunandagonro xaʙari xus deh, ki ʙa saʙaʙi saʙrason dar dunjovu oxirat sodu xurram megardand
